lead_paragraph: A geology professor discusses protests over a study trip to the Mideast, and a student explains why some members of her generation are outspoken.

headline.main: Campus Activism: Views of a Teacher and a Student
headline.print_headline: Campus Activism: Views of a Teacher and a Student
